verses.name: 2 Samuel 8:8
verses.text: And from Betah, and from Berothai, cities of Hadadezer, king David took exceeding much brass.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 8:9
verses.text: When Toi king of Hamath heard that David had smitten all the host of Hadadezer,

verses.name: 2 Samuel 8:10
verses.text: Then Toi sent Joram his son unto king David, to salute him, and to bless him, because he had fought against Hadadezer, and smitten him: for Hadadezer had wars with Toi. And Joram brought with him vessels of silver, and vessels of gold, and vessels of brass:
